pullrequest.title: Add flag for MOI rescaling to sdf 1.4

content.raw:
It looks like @hsu added hooks into ODE for setting this flag in [gazebo pull request 1014](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1014) (see dWorldSetQuickStepInertiaRatioReduction). This pull request is in gazebo 3.1 and later. All that's needed for these versions is to check the appropriate flag and call the API. I'll make a quick pull request for that.

Some back porting would need to be done for gazebo 1.9 and 2.2.
